mutants.original_line: return {key: remove_none_values(value) for key, value in json_data.items() if value is not None}
mutants.mutated_line: return {key: remove_none_values(value) for (key, value) in json_data.items() if value is None}

mutants.original_line: return [remove_none_values(item) for item in json_data if item is not None]
mutants.mutated_line: return [remove_none_values(item) for item in json_data if item is None]
